Hi.  Thank you for telling me that.  I like the layout of the site.  This g=
roup seems to be very welcoming.  I think I am going to like it here.
  ---=
-- Original Message ----- 
  From: airly2000 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com =

  Sent: Saturday, August 17, 2002 2:56 AM
  Subject: Re: New Member


  He=
yas!!!

  Welcome to this RPG!!!

  you are allowed to use around 5 charact=
ers, by now. If you want to 
  check that or other rule, you should check i=
t in the RPG's site ( 
  http://nbwrpg.com ) or speak with Rauq and/or the =
others moderators.

  Welcome here :)



  --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Dave Finnam=
ore" <dfinnamore@h...> wrote:
  > Hello all.  I have been in the group for =
a bit now, and just 
  deciding when to come in.  I am a long time TF fan, =
since way back in 
  G1 days.  Also, I broke into PBeM role playing about a=
 year ago, and 
  it's one of my hobbies.  Anyway, I have finally made my d=
ecision.  
  Due to being a former WCW(a wrestling company) in 1996, I have=
 
  decided I will join the New World Order.  I will make characters for 
 =
 other groups soon though.  Seeing as how they like to base their 
  charac=
ters on wrestlers, I will stick with the trend.  I'm not sure 
  how many c=
haracters we are allowed to have, but it looks like some 
  people have a s=
mall handful, so I will just start off with three.  
  Savage, Wrath and Cr=
ush, if you will.


        Yahoo! Groups Sponsor 
              ADVERTISEM=
ENT
             
       

  Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Ya=
hoo! Terms of Service.
